sentences.en: Australia had 15 years of double-digit inflation.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚有15年通货膨胀率维持在两位数。

sentences.en: Bit 11 - 13 ( first digit ) - values range from 2 to 7.
sentences.cn: 第 11-13 位 ( 头一位数 ) -- 取值范围为2到7.

sentences.en: But then Kevin signed an astronomical nine - digit extension, and things got funny.
sentences.cn: 当加内特以九位的天文数字与球队续约后, 事情变得有趣了.

sentences.en: China car audio market will rise at a double - digit growth rate.
sentences.cn: 中国的汽车音响市场将会以两位数增长.

sentences.en: Describes the structural features and working principle of GD - SJ serial digit - controlledskeining machines.
sentences.cn: 介绍了GD -SJ 系列数控成绞机的结构特点及工作原理.

sentences.en: Enter 3 digit code code list , then the LED blinks three times.
sentences.cn: 按照代码表输入三位代码, LED会闪烁三次.

sentences.en: Find the largest palindrome made from the product of two 3 - digit numbers.
sentences.cn: 求能分解为两个三位数乘积的最大回文数.

sentences.en: Good stuff. Value should be estimated to 5 digit or above.
sentences.cn: 好宝贝! 估是五位数字以上之物.

sentences.en: Her telephone number differs from mine by one digit.
sentences.cn: 她的电话号码跟我的差一个数字。

sentences.en: I cannot see more than that, except beyond plankton is the digit zero.
sentences.cn: 再往远处我就什么也看不见了.只见浮游生物之外是零这个数字.

sentences.en: If you only have the 11 digit number go to this website.
sentences.cn: 如果你只有11位数字到本网站.

sentences.en: Lucius Verus : Are you the digit they call the Spaniard?
sentences.cn: 卢修斯: 你就是他们称作西班牙人的人?

sentences.en: Only Scotland saw a single digit drop , falling by 6 %.
sentences.cn: 只有苏格兰的房价降幅保持在一位数之内其值为6%.

sentences.en: The computer can multiply two 10 - digit numbers in 1 / 1000 second.
sentences.cn: 计算机能在千分之一秒内算出两个十位数数字的乘积.

sentences.en: Turnover this year is likely to see high single - digit growth.
sentences.cn: 今年营业额估计有接近十的单位数增长.

sentences.en: With digit inflation and rising unemployment, drastic remedies were called for.
sentences.cn: 面临两位数的通胀和失业率的攀升, 唯有施以猛药才能治愈顽疾.

words.tran_cn: 数字化；洋地黄疗法；洋地黄丸
数字器，[计] 数字转换器
[计] 数字化，数位化，数码化

trans.tran_en: one of the written signs that represent the numbers 0 to 9
